cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 22nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 22nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Deluxe 6 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Apartments have 3 bedrooms with 3 bathroom attached. Bedding configuration is standard 2 king bed and 2 single beds. Full kitchen includes fridge/freezer, dishwasher, oven, cook top, microwave and a coffee machine. Free Wifi and Netflix

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 22nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 22nd Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
